steps.title: Purchase Order
steps.content: Here you can generate the order for the things which you want to purchase

steps.title: Purchase Order
steps.content:
Here you can
  • Create a Draft
  • Redesign Order
  • Submit the Draft
  • Approve the Order
  • Process the Order
  • Shows Completed Orders
  • Shows Canceled Orders

steps.title: Draft
steps.content: This Tab provides facility for creating a Draft for purchase order

steps.title: Redesign
steps.content: This Tab provides facility for modify the order which is not approved

steps.title: Submit
steps.content:
In this Tab Order can be
  • Approve
  • Cancel
  • Redirect to Redesign

steps.title: Approved Order
steps.content: In this Tab process will start on the order by sending the order to the supplier

steps.title: Processed Order
steps.content: In this Tab we recieve the item and mark as processed if it is complete

steps.title: Canceled Order
steps.content: This Tab shows the rejected order
